mapper.select: select honoursCategoryNo, categoryNm, international, createDt, updateDt from honoursCategory;
mapper.insert: insert into honours (honoursNm, updateDt, createDt, state, userNo, honoursCategoryNo) VALUES (#{honoursNm}, now(), now(), 1, #{userNo}, #{honoursCategoryNo})
mapper.select: select honoursNo, honoursNm, updateDt, createDt, userNo, honoursCategoryNo from honours where state = 1 order by createDt desc
